FuncDef: The display router id command displays the configured router ID.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the router ID on the public network, run the display router id command. To view the router ID of the VPN instance configured on the device, run the display router id vpn-instance command.
Prerequisites
The VPN instance has been configured.
